To proceed effectively, I should consider the surrounding elements. The avatar is surrounded by a wall to the left (at (6, 12)), a free floor tile to the right (at (6, 14)), and a table below (at (7, 13)). There's the possibility of moving to (6, 14) or (5, 13) (up), but that would just move me closer to the walls or maintain my position.

Given that moving to the right (6, 14) would keep me within free space while moving away from potential threats and could eventually allow me to navigate further, I will take that action.

``` Action:2 ``` 
I expect this movement will open up more paths to navigate while I collect the resources and avoid the chef.
